metadata.title: CVE-2022-42321 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Xenstore: Guests can crash xenstored via exhausting the stack Xenstored is using recursion for some Xenstore operations (e.g. for deleting a sub-tree of Xenstore nodes). With sufficiently deep nesting levels this can result in stack exhaustion on xenstored, leading to a crash of xenstored.

notes.note: mdeslaur> hypervisor packages are in universe. For issues in the hypervisor, add appropriate tags to each section, ex: Tags_xen: universe-binary

criterions.comment: xen package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
